oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two relatively simple non-variational wave functions for two electron diatomic molecules are proposed. The electron-electron cusp condition is satisfied rigorously by a correlation function which has the correct behavior for r(12) --> 0 and r(12) --> infinity. The electron-nucleus cusp conditions are also rigorously satisfied by the proposed functional forms of the wave functions. The parameters are chosen to match the asymptotic conditions in two different approximations. Both wave functions yield very good energies for the chemical bond. This demonstrates that these local conditions have a big effect on the wave function.
